# The `VPIntrinsic` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This is the common base class for vector predication intrinsics. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::VPIntrinsic</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

This is the common base class for vector predication intrinsics.
